title: Raspberry Pi
description: I have always had an interest in these, because of the many different things you can do with them.  They are portable and very versatile.

title: Xcode
description: During the lockdown period, I thought I would try using the App Development Kit that came with my MacBook.  I watched a few youtube videos and working through the Apples own tutorials on using Xcode.

title: Unity
description: While working through the Xcode work, I have downloaded Unity and have lined that up for my next project.  I could hopefully learn enough to build an app, that I could use on my VR Quest.

title: Sci-Fi & Anime
description: I have always enjoyed watching Star Trek: Next Generation, because thats something I used to do growing up with my Dad, I must have watched the majority of all Star Trek.  I also enjoy watching Stargate SG1, and the other series that have spawned from the original.  I have a small collection of Anime, mainly having Sci-fi like 'Ghost in the Shell' and 'Deathnote'.

title: Call of Duty Mobile
description: I have always liked watching people play games, so I thought I would try my hand at recording my own battles with 99 other people.  I would do a screen recording on my mobile phone and then transfer the recording to my laptop.  I would then edit the video using iMovie, learning how to use iMovie in the process.  After I was happy with the finished product, I would then upload it to YouTube.

title: Home Automation
description: At the moment I have a few smart plugs that control various devices and a light bulb.  I plan to increase the amount of automation in my home, for example having automatic blinds, smart door locks, and lights.  I have a few smart home devices, but I haven't chosen a specific brand because they offer different functions.

title: PHP
description: After completing my Fullstack Web Developer Course, most people would like PHP knowledge so I am learning this to increase my chances of employment.  I am also finding quite enjoyable.
